EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Cloud Native Roadshow_2017.Munich Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Cloud-Native Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are looking forward to seeing you tomorrow in Munich at the Cloud-Native Roadshow. Please review the event details below and feel free to email the team at cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io]]> with any questions.
Date: Tuesday, June 27, 2017
Time: 8:30am - 4:00pm
Location: Google Germany Erika-Mann-Str. 33, Munich, BY 80636 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Erika-Mann-Stra%C3%9Fe+33,+80636+M%C3%BCnchen,+Germany/@48.1428955,11.5387277,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x479e760378ce92bb:0xb30b48d10d452df7!8m2!3d48.1428955!4d11.5409164]]>)
Agenda:
8:30am - 9:30am Registration & Breakfast 9:30am - 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm - 1:00pm Lunch 12:40pm - 1:00pm Presentations by our Ecosystem Partners 1:00pm - 3:45pm Sessions 3:45pm - 4:00pm Panel Q&A
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/munich?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-2017]]>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
